thread.title: BRIEF-Gold Standard Announces US$ 25.8 Mln 2018 Development, Exploration Program For Railroad Project, Carlin Trend, Nevada

title: BRIEF-Gold Standard Announces US$ 25.8 Mln 2018 Development, Exploration Program For Railroad Project, Carlin Trend, Nevada
text: February 26, 2018 / 11:52 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Gold Standard Announces US$ 25.8 Mln 2018 Development, Exploration Program For Railroad Project, Carlin Trend, Nevada Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Gold Standard Ventures Corp: * GOLD STANDARD ANNOUNCES US$ 25.8 MILLION 2018 DEVELOPMENT AND EXPLORATION PROGRAM FOR THE RAILROAD PROJECT, CARLIN TREND, NEVADA * GOLD STANDARD VENTURES - ‚ÄçFUNDING FOR THIS PROGRAM ALREADY OBTAINED THROUGH PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED PRIVATE PLACEMENT, PUBLIC OFFERING, AND FINANCING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
